name: Karen Joy Fritz
what_you_do: Karen Joy Fritz is an Evolutionary Coach, Speaker, and Author.
social_proof: Karen has degrees in Neuropsychology and Computer Science from the University of Michigan and multiple coaching certifications including Integral Coaching and Enneagram. She has enjoyed successful 7-figure entrepreneurial ventures while being hired to teach on five continents.
signature_programs: PATH: A Strategic Transformation Game, Purposetivity: The Feminine Face of Productivity, The Art of Adventure
business_focus: Karen takes a stand for transforming the fabric of society through conscious, awake people innovating sustainable solutions that bring more joy, passion, and aliveness to the world.
